code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const User=_ref=>{let{userId}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetcher=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/api/user/id/'+userId);const data=await response.json();setUser(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);}};fetcher();},[userId]);if(user===null)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Loading..."});else return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-element",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:user.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD559\uB144: ",user.school_year,"\uD559\uB144"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uAC00\uC785 \uC77C\uC790: ",user.creation_date]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-element",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uC791\uC131 \uAE00 \uBAA9\uB85D"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),user.posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:'/post/'+post.id,children:post.title})," (\u2764\uFE0F ",post.likes,")"]}))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-element",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uC791\uC131 \uB313\uAE00 \uBAA9\uB85D"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),user.comments.map(comment=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:'/post/'+comment.original_post_id,children:comment.content})}))]})]});};export default User;
